
#include<iostream>

int main()
{
	int nTestCases;
	std::cin >> nTestCases;
	while(nTestCases--)
	{
		int nMinIndex = 0;
		int nCandles;
		std::cin >> nCandles;
		int nCandlesZero = nCandles;
		int nMinCandles = 10;
		int i = 1;
		while(i < 10)
		{
			std::cin >> nCandles;
			if(nCandles < nMinCandles)
			{
				nMinCandles = nCandles;
				nMinIndex = i;
			}
			i++;
		}

		if(nMinCandles)
		{
			if(nCandlesZero < nMinCandles)
			{
				nMinCandles = nCandlesZero;
				nMinIndex = 0;
			}
		}

		if(nMinIndex == 0)
		{
			std::cout << "1";
		}
		while(nMinCandles >= 0)
		{
			std::cout << nMinIndex;
			nMinCandles--;
		}
		std::cout << std::endl;

	}
	return 0;
}
